channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [CONFIGURATION-760] Properties file using cyclical includes cause a StackOverflowError instead of detecting the misconfiguration
item.description:
Properties file using cyclical includes cause a StackOverflowError instead of detecting the misconfiguration.

For example, see org.apache.commons.configuration2.TestPropertiesConfiguration.testIncludeLoadAllCycliclaReference():

See https://github.com/apache/commons-configuration/pull/35
item.summary: Properties file using cyclical includes cause a StackOverflowError instead of detecting the misconfiguration

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
